fields.name: Sacrifice:
fields.value: Attack a player. If they are a role you cannot win with, their defense will appear too high.

fields.name: Channel Spirits:
fields.value: You may only use this role if there is a player you have killed with Sacrifice that you have not already used this ability with. Attack a player with your attack score + the attack score of every player you've killed with Sacrifice on the turn of their death. If you attack a Town player with this attack, rampage on all players visiting that player's house, including yourself.
